pr_title: Defines a default Index including  the tenant and searchPrefixes

timeline.message:
Defines a default Index including  the tenant and searchPrefixes

Which will be created for all MongoTenantAware entities.

Fixes: SIRI-184

timeline.body:
shouldn't this be named prefix_index to overwrite the index defined by PrefixSearchable Entity?

otherwise we end up with two entities where the original one will almost never be used(?)
timeline.bodyText:
shouldn't this be named prefix_index to overwrite the index defined by PrefixSearchable Entity?
otherwise we end up with two entities where the original one will almost never be used(?)
timeline.bodyHTML:
shouldn't this be named prefix_index to overwrite the index defined by PrefixSearchable Entity?

otherwise we end up with two entities where the original one will almost never be used(?)
timeline.author: andyHa

replies.bodyText: The real index name is searchPrefixes_1 since it wasn't using the name property of the annotation. All indexes must be dropped and recreated anyway, therefore I would include the word tenant in the name to better indicate how the index is build up.
replies.author: idlira

replies.bodyText: i meant name it so that the parent index as defined by PrefixSearchableEntity is suppressed - although a misleading name in mongo would be created then - still better than a mostly unused index
replies.author: andyHa

timeline.message:
Removes default prefix_index in PrefixSearchableEntity

Fixes: SIRI-184

Adds an index for searchPrefixes

Fixes: SIRI-84

Renames index to better match other entities

Fixes: SIRI-184

timeline.body:
```suggestion
 * Note that the <tt>searchPrefixes</tt> is not automatically indexed as it usually only makes sense if indexed
```
timeline.bodyText:

             * Note that the <tt>searchPrefixes</tt> is not automatically indexed as it usually only make sense if indexed
          
          
            
             * Note that the <tt>searchPrefixes</tt> is not automatically indexed as it usually only makes sense if indexed

* Note that the <tt>searchPrefixes</tt> is not automatically indexed as it usually only makes sense if indexed
timeline.author: sabieber
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,8 +29,12 @@
 
 /**
  * Maintains a <tt>prefixSearchField</tt> in which all fields annotated with {@link PrefixSearchContent} are indexed.
+ *
+ * Note that the <tt>searchPrefixes</tt> is not automatically indexed as it usually only make sense if indexed
